column1: Heading into 2020 one of my top priorities is to empower rural America by enhancing access to quality health care for the next generation of farmers & ranchers in West Texas & beyond.  Watch more of my full interview w/ @KCBD11 in Lubbock this week: https://t.co/h8T356wYGK https://t.co/zfTDL7fUPl

Today we celebrate the Light of the World the King of Kings and the greatest gift of all: Jesus God’s only son and sacrifice for our sins.   From my family to yours Merry Christmas!  Thank you for the honor of representing you and your families.  #MerryChristmas https://t.co/OetST2ITcx

ICYMI: 2 years after the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act we are seeing more economic prosperity & more hard-earned dollars staying in the pockets of Americans!  The U.S. now has the FOURTH LOWEST tax burden among advanced economies in the world: https://t.co/FnnpmCLNkW #TCJA2Year

We're doing irreparable harm to our Republic & the institution of the Presidency because Democrats have weaponized #Impeachment & our congressional oversight responsibilities.  Unfortunately the next generation will inherit a much more dysfunctional Congress as a result. https://t.co/FRqZ5j7teG

We have to fight & speak up to ensure our interests & values of the folks in small-town USA are heard in our nation’s capital.   If I am sent back to D.C. I will continue to fight for our values.   Read more from my one-on-one w/ the @OlneyEnterprise: https://t.co/ZUb9x49KYd https://t.co/TA8I0q29Fn

There is a crisis in rural health care w/ rural hospitals closing in #TX19 & across the nation.  We must end the one-size-fits-all healthcare system eliminate regulations & mandates that cripple rural hospitals & secure a strong future for rural America.  More from @KRBCnews: https://t.co/HPt4kQNed4

May we never forget those who lost their lives 78 years ago in the attack on #PearlHarbor & may we always show the resolve that has made America the strongest safest & freest nation the world has ever known. #PearlHarborRemembranceDay https://t.co/o1Rq4nkOig

Joining @PrattonTexas at 5:00 P.M. CT to talk to my fellow West Texans about the latest in Washington & our work to bring more #WestTexas values to our nation's capital.  LISTEN IN HERE: https://t.co/T3yzXsrAsu
Honored to earn the endorsement of @TXAlliance4Life!   If re-elected I will continue to support policies & initiatives to defend & protect #Life:   https://t.co/rh637WA2PM
Thankful for the grace of God the blessings of liberty & the honor of serving West Texas in our nation’s capital.  From my family to yours - Happy #Thanksgiving! https://t.co/Gd1yZTm5UT

Of all our accomplishments so far I'm particularly proud of the work we've done to make good on our promises to our nation's #veterans.  We're thankful for the sacrifices you & your families have made & are praying for all our men & women in uniform this #Thanksgiving. https://t.co/CwEUtNaQqI

There's no other nation as great as America because of the American people & our freedoms not because of our federal government.  I hope voters in #TX19 send me back because I've delivered on my promises to rein in government in a way that reflects the very best of West Texas: https://t.co/wJ2HT1YFRO

ICYMI: I'm proud of what we've been able to accomplish & I hope that West Texas will see fit to send me back to keep fighting for them for the future of our country & for West Texas values.  But there's more work to be done: https://t.co/4994iBQco3

I hope the good people of West Texas send me back so I can continue to fight for them for our values & for our belief in a safe strong & free America.   We must return power back to the people of West Texas & the American people. #TX19 https://t.co/MmuhGkimkv
https://t.co/O3PZAcmWn3

IT'S OFFICIAL: I'm running for re-election to continue representing the people & values of West Texas in our nation’s capital. If re-elected – I will continue my commitment to reining in Washington restoring our freedoms & returning power back to We The People. #TX19 https://t.co/LdBr2nRpe3

Thank you for the privilege & the honor of representing you & your families here in our nation's capital.  We're going to keep fighting the good fight reining in Washington draining the swamp & restoring freedom back to the people.  #TX19 https://t.co/c1UGGAUyyU
BIG announcement coming soon — stay tuned! #2020Election https://t.co/gBhqKqUUoU

“Today we honor the one percent of Americans who gave their today so that we can have our tomorrow.  Thank you to ALL who have served and Happy #VeteransDay!" https://t.co/IK8rw3NKie
My hero Gene Arrington is 82 years young today. Happy Birthday Dad! https://t.co/1hDTIxZU7q

I commend @realDonaldTrump for actually caring about how much we pay to support our allies relative to others. The Democrats’ impeachment #hoax is nothing more than “Russian Collusion” Version 2.0: https://t.co/fqvLHjMJKp

Exercising my freedom and responsibility to keep Texas great! Go vote Go West Texas! #Vote #EarlyVoting https://t.co/gZPLYVPWdk

By weaponizing our oversight responsibilities Democrats are doing irreparable harm to our democracy with their #ImpeachmentSham against @realDonaldTrump. Watch my take on @KCBD11 in Lubbock Tonight: https://t.co/5vG6U3YBZF

ICYMI: So far in the year 2019 @realDonaldTrump’s administration has apprehended a total of 1 million migrants at the southern border - 88% higher than in 2018!  This is proof that conservative policies help SECURE our border and PROTECT our citizens: https://t.co/sOc4NHVqI9
Great to join @ChadHastyRadio this week to talk about @TheDemocrats attack on rural America & attempts to chip away at our #SecondAmendment rights. Listen @KFYO:  https://t.co/Mj8911E9hV

Happy #ConstitutionDay  232 years ago our founding fathers signed the document that built the foundation of history’s greatest experiment in liberty. The Constitution clearly states that #WeThePeople control the destiny of America & we must continue to honor this timeless truth. https://t.co/lB2sbsGGQW
This was a major loophole that is now closed which will have a significant impact on stopping illegal immigration to the United States. #SecureOurBorder

Very pleased to see the Supreme Court rule that @realDonaldTrump's asylum policy will STAND – preventing thousands from claiming asylum in the U.S. after passing through another country. https://t.co/jl5ji5FjnI

Today we remember the evil attack on our nation that forever changed America. May we #NeverForget those who lost their lives in this despicable act of terror & continue to honor law enforcement & first responders who made the ultimate sacrifice to protect our fellow Americans. https://t.co/Qpxkyfbu2Y

The best anti-poverty program still is & will always be a job. Thanks to @GOP tax cuts & @realDonaldTrump's regulatory relief we’ve seen:   ✅ 136000 Jobs added in August ✅ Unemployment at a 50-year low ✅ Wages on the Rise  #JobsReport https://t.co/NqfeFL0fVU
Wishing you and your family a happy and safe 4th of July!  #HappyIndependenceDay and God Bless West Texas! https://t.co/i3mL8Jh7Cx
Happy Father's Day to my hero! Love you dad!  To my children: Thanks for the best Father's Day gift ever - hanging out with you all day! So proud of y'all! https://t.co/pptOpy31Zw

Almost a year after the signing of the Declaration of Independence the Second Continental Congress adopted the Stars and Stripes as our Nation’s official flag. This momentous piece of history has given us a symbol of our shared American values of freedom unity and prosperity. https://t.co/XWcwoD8GY7

On this day in 1775 the first branch of our Nation’s defense was born. Soldiers in the @USArmy continue to protect and serve Americans with integrity and willingness to lay their lives on the line in the name of liberty. Thank you for being our “Guardians of Freedom.” #ArmyBDay https://t.co/QABETJD0QP
Today marks #DDay75thAnniversary  Let us honor those courageous heroes that stormed the beaches of Normandy and defined what bravery looks like. https://t.co/R50wgtl9o6
All gave some some gave all. - Howard William Osterkamp  Join me this #MemorialDay to honor the American heroes who paid the ultimate sacrifice for our freedom and safety. https://t.co/NfMJqZOAQX

As the son of a teacher from West Texas I hold a special place for educators across our nation. Join me this #TeacherAppreciationWeek to thank the men and women that inspire America’s next generation of leaders. https://t.co/htbHBXOdfu
He is risen indeed! #HappyEaster from our family to yours! https://t.co/rUNzMz0M1E

On this #GoodFriday we remember the sacrifice of our Savior Jesus Christ. Through His death we have received the forgiveness of our sins.   “When he had received the drink Jesus said ‘It is finished.’ With that he bowed his head and gave up his spirit.” – John 19:30 https://t.co/wo9JtgAdat

Today we honor the selfless sacrifices our Vietnam Veterans made to protect our freedoms. May we never forget their courage.  Thank you for your service! #VietnamWarVeteransDay https://t.co/TmDvA7PIby

On this day in 1836 Texas declared its independence from Mexico. As we celebrate our great state we remember significant heroes such as Stephen F. Austin Sam Houston and James Bowie. Texas is the food fuel and fiber of this nation! https://t.co/A0vBQdSe1O

Today we honor the enduring legacy of Martin Luther King Jr. His dreams continue to be etched in the hearts of Americans. May we all continue to revere his accomplishments and sacrifices that changed the course of our country and continue to help shape this great nation.#MLKDay https://t.co/nF5Bd5ksEe
